thread.title: Gucci Mane Doesn't Care Who The President Is
thread.title_full: Gucci Mane Doesn't Care Who The President Is

author: Shaun M
title: Gucci Mane Doesn't Care Who The President Is
text:
Home > Music > Gucci Mane Doesn't Care Who The President Is Gucci Mane Doesn't Care Who The President Is 0 0 Posted by Shaun M  21pm Gucci Mane revealed why it doesn't matter who the president is. 
On a mission to improve himself since getting clean and getting out of jail, Gucci Mane sat down with Marilyn Manson for CR Men’s Book to reveal his future plans. The Atlanta rapper said it doesn't change a thing who controls the U.S. government. 
“I don’t give a damn who the president is right now,” Guwop said as reported by XXL . “If Hillary won, if Jeb Bush won, if Ben Carson won, I got the same plan: get me some money, keep putting out my music, keep just trying to be a better person than what I was. Four years from now, I expect to be in a better position than I’m in now, but I don’t feel like the president is going to put me in a better position.”Gucci is on the cover of CR Men’s Book , which hits the stands March 2. < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 21, 2017 at 05:21pm 0 Views 
Rest In Peace to the noble beast, who broke free from a slaughterhouse and found himself in the police chase of a lifetime. Gucci Mane revealed why it doesn't matter who the president is. 
On a mission to improve himself since getting clean and getting out of jail, Gucci Mane sat down with Marilyn Manson for CR Men’s Book to reveal his future plans. The Atlanta rapper said it doesn't change a thing who controls the U.S. government. 
“I don’t give a damn who the president is right now,” Guwop said as reported by XXL . “If Hillary won, if Jeb Bush won, if Ben Carson won, I got the same plan: get me some money, keep putting out my music, keep just trying to be a better person than what I was. Four years from now, I expect to be in a better position than I’m in now, but I don’t feel like the president is going to put me in a better position.”Gucci is on the cover of CR Men’s Book , which hits the stands March 2.
